<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Red Mantis Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=895) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 71 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=17)

**Prerequisites**
trained in [sawtooth sabers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=65); worshipper of [Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=29); lawful evil alignment; member of the Red Mantis assassins

**Access**
You are from Mediogalti Island.

</column>

---

You have learned how to stalk your foes and slay them with a sawtooth sabre. You become trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) and Assassin [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8); if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency with [sawtooth sabers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=65).

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Red Mantis assassin archetype.

<title level="2">Red Mantis Assassin Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Red Mantis Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=896), [Crimson Shroud](/Feats.aspx?ID=898), [Prayer Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=2164)
